name: Draw One line
description:
Draw one line, is an simple but addictive game. We well-design 235 puzzle levels, although the game size is around 3 megabyte, we believe it will bring you over 3 hours' interesting time.

Drawing one line to connect two black circles;
The draw line should bypass the obstacles;
The draw line should pass all gray grids.

If you are interested in this game, please give us some good reviews, and check our other puzzle games in https://itunes.apple.com/us/developer/an-zhuona/id1262294397

More feedbacks, please email to azhuona@gmail.com
